features: Huggies Nourish Scented Baby Wipes: 6 push button packs of 56 scented wipes (336 wipes total); features Disney's The Lion King designs
4-in-1 Sensitive Skincare: Cleans, hydrates, soothes and replenishes your baby’s delicate skin with every wipe
Lightly Scented: Baby diaper wipes are enriched with cocoa and shea butter
Plant-Based Wipes Since 1990*: Huggies scented wipes are plant-based, designed to gently clean while moisturizing your baby's skin
0% Parabens: Hypoallergenic baby wipes are dermatologist-tested, pH-balanced and free of alcohol, dyes and elemental chlorine
body.description: Clean, hydrate, soothe and replenish your baby's delicate skin with the 4 in 1 Sensitive Skincare of Huggies Nourish Baby Wipes. Each baby wipe is lightly scented and enriched with cocoa and shea butter for a luxurious experience. Offering you plant-based ingredients* for over 20 years, these diaper wipes are hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested and pH-balanced to help maintain healthy skin. They are also alcohol free, paraben free and do not contain phenoxyethanol or MIT. Plus, with a push-button feature and EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing, it’s easy to grab wipes when your hands are full. Featuring Disney's The Lion King designs that are as cute as your baby, Huggies Nourish disposable wipes are perfect to pair with your Huggies diaper! (*70%+ by weight)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Your skin is extra special and deserves extra care Huggies Nourish Wipes do four things at once (kind of like mom) to clean, hydrate, soothe and replenish.
Tough enough for messes, soft enough for your skin You deserve soft, baby, so our Nourish wipes are hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested and pH-balanced.

What makes Huggies Nourish Baby Wipes right for you, baby? Sometimes your delicate skin needs extra care, baby. Huggies Nourish Baby wipes are plant-based* since 1990 and designed to gently clean while moisturizing your skin. You might be wondering, baby, how do these wipes care for your skin? Our scented baby wipes are hypoallergenic, dermatologist-tested and pH-balanced. They are also free of alcohol, dyes and elemental chlorine. Counting is new to you, baby. So, what does 4-in-1 Sensitive Skincare mean? Our Nourish diaper wipes are designed to do four things at once (kind of like mom does!). Made with cocoa and shea butter, these baby wipes clean, hydrate, soothe and replenish with every clean. Are these wipes easy to grab one-handed? Mom’s got her hands full, baby. But don’t worry, our wipes have EZ Pull 1-Handed Dispensing so it’s easy to grab just one baby wipe at a time without wasting sheets. Using the toilet is an important lesson to learn, baby, but are Huggies baby wipes flushable? Designed for cushiony softness and durability, Huggies baby wet wipes don’t easily break down after flushing. Please don’t flush baby wipes, and instead use the trash bin for your wipes and diapers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and moist and easy to access
reviews.reviewText: I had bought another brand from Amazon and was they were good but the main drawback was pulling them out and having them break. Not the case here. Thick enough so they won’t break and easy on hand deployment. It has a plastic cover that snaps over so they remain moist. And moist they are. The scent is vaguely reminiscent of cocoa butter but by no means over powering or cloying. Very sturdy for almost all tasks. Gentle on skin. The packs are a bit bulkier than you might be used to but I have them about the house. It would be a bit unwieldy for the average purse. Definitely a good buy

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars MY GO TO
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE these wipes, I use them for taking off my makeup (I don’t have kids to use them on lol) and they work great! I love the scent, not overpowering at all but soft and how gentle they are. I can’t always find them in store so I usually am left to ordering them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thick and soft!
reviews.reviewText: These are very soft and thick. The fragrance is light and refreshing. Definitely worth the money. Way better than any other brand we've tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best wipes! I use these for my adult self they are so good, soft and smell wonderful!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm a truck driver and I have tried types of baby wipes. There not real wet and not real dry. The moisture and scent is absolutely amazing. You don't have to use three and four wipes. Just one. There think and thin enough. Must BUY.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Huggies Wipes
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect for babies and toddlers! We use them for pottying, hands, face, and a quick wipe down/freshening up. They smell AMAZING, feel incredible, and don't taste icky if you happen to wipe something that has to go in your mouth. 👀 I only buy them in bulk because I hate to be without them 🤣

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great overall product.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for my 2 year old niece she has sensitive skin and these work extremely well. I have used these products since I got custody of my niece back in January of 2022 and it honestly does nourish her textured skin. I hope my review will convince you to buy this product for your child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024

reviews.reviewText: We love these wipes! Thick and smell great. They last well in the wipe warmer too. Just all around great product. We hardly use diaper cream too and I thinks it’s because these wipes are so moisturizing. We used these randomly as first time parents buying wipes and these were a real winner.
